## handleHelpServiceError() function

Handles help service error

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function handleHelpServiceError(showNotFound: () => void, notifications: GlobalNotificationsService): MonoTypeOperatorFunction<string | null>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  showNotFound | <code>() =&gt; void</code> | Method used for displaying not found |
|  notifications | <code>GlobalNotificationsService</code> | Service used for notifications |
